name: D4SH
description:
Made for the Black and White Jam under the theme of "Loop"

Run around and through the goals in D4SH, a small game jam platformer!

This is my first game jam game and I had a blast making this, I hope the people in the jam have fun on this short but neat game!

Controls (PC and Controller):

Arrow Keys /D-Pad to move

Up Arrow/ X/ A to jump

Shift/Square/x to dash

Other info:

bedtime after a coffee by Barradeen | https://soundcloud.com/barradeen/
